Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20075369 SCM, a proposed site selection of Block 1154, Lot 108 for the acquisition of a building currently leased for the 850-seat Beacon High School in Council District 6, Borough of Manhattan.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: School Construction, Beacon High School, Manhattan (20075369SCM)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Brewer, Avella and Gerson

Items.Title: Application no. 20075369 SCM, a proposed site selection of Block 1154, Lot 108 for the acquisition of a building currently leased for the 850-seat Beacon High School in Council District 6, Borough of Manhattan.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Subcommittee with Companion Resolution
